workflow.name: 0055 - Orbital - Top Windows IR Indicators to ServiceNow
workflow.title: 0055 - Orbital - Top Windows IR Indicators to ServiceNow

properties.name: ServiceNow User ID
properties.description: The username of the user you're using to open incident tickets. This can either match the username in your ServiceNow account key or, if the account has the appropriate permissions, can be a different user

properties.name: Open Resources
properties.description: Placeholder for a list of open resources/network shares. This will be populated automatically

properties.name: Secure Endpoint GUID
properties.description: Placeholder for a device's Cisco Secure Endpoint GUID. This will be populated automatically

properties.name: Local DNS Cache
properties.description: Placeholder for a list of locally cached DNS entries. This will be populated automatically

properties.name: Process List
properties.description: Placeholder for a list of running processes. This will be populated automatically

properties.name: Recent Office Documents
properties.description: Placeholder for a list of recently opened Microsoft Office documents. This will be populated automatically

properties.name: SecureX Region
properties.description: Placeholder for the region being used. This is used when building links to Orbital and will be populated automatically

properties.name: observable_type
properties.description: The type of observable pivoted on

properties.name: IP Address
properties.description: Placeholder for a device's IP address. This will be populated automatically

properties.name: Local Accounts
properties.description: Placeholder for a list of local user accounts. This will be populated automatically

properties.name: Logged In User Details
properties.description: Placeholder for a list of details about the logged in user. This will be populated automatically

properties.name: Installed Programs
properties.description: Placeholder for a list of programs installed on the host. This will be populated automatically

properties.name: Documents Folder
properties.description: Placeholder for a list of files in the user's Documents folder. This will be populated automatically

properties.name: Outbound Network Connections
properties.description: Placeholder for a list of outbound network connections. This will be populated automatically

properties.name: Listening Ports
properties.description: Placeholder for a list of listening/open ports. This will be populated automatically

properties.name: PowerShell Activity
properties.description: Placeholder for a list of recent PowerShell activity. This will be populated automatically

properties.name: Desktop Folder
properties.description: Placeholder for a list of files in the user's Desktop folder. This will be populated automatically

properties.name: Downloads Folder
properties.description: Placeholder for a list of files in the user's Downloads folder. This will be populated automatically

properties.name: Browser Extensions
properties.description: Placeholder for a list of Chrome browser extensions. This will be populated automatically

properties.name: Host Uptime
properties.description: Placeholder for the host's uptime. This will be populated automatically

properties.name: USB Activity
properties.description: Placeholder for a list of recent USB activity. This will be populated automatically

properties.name: observable_value
properties.description: The value of the observable pivoted on. This should be a hostname for this workflow

properties.name: Autostart Programs
properties.description: Placeholder for a list of autostart/autoexec programs. This will be populated automatically

properties.name: Logged In User
properties.description: Placeholder for the name of the logged in user. This will be populated automatically

properties.name: Hostname
properties.description: Placeholder for a device's hostname. This will be populated automatically

properties.name: Named Pipes
properties.description: Placeholder for a list of named pipes. This will be populated automatically

properties.name: MAC Address
properties.description: Placeholder for a device's MAC address. This will be populated automatically

Runs multiple Oribtal queries on the endpoint provided to look for top incident response indicators of compromise. The results are then posted to a ServiceNow incident. Supported observables: hostname, mac_address, ip, amp_computer_guid

Documentation: https://ciscosecurity.github.io/sxo-05-security-workflows/workflows/0055

Target Group: Default TargetGroup

Targets: Orbital_For_Access_Token, Orbital_Target, ServiceNow

Steps:
[] Detect the region
[] Make sure the observable type provided is supported
[] Run Orbital queries for:
[]> Logged in user
[]> List of local accounts
[]> Documents, Downloads, and Desktop folder contents
[]> Recent USB activity
[]> Recent Office documents
[]> List of installed programs
[]> List of Chrome extensions
[]> Named pipes
[]> List of processes
[]> List of outbound and listening network connections
[]> Local DNS cache
[]> List of open shares
[]> List of autoexecute binaries
[]> Tecent PowerShell activity
[]> Host uptime
[] Log results in a ServiceNow incident
